name: DUCK look for luck!
description:
DUCK look for luck!

After my private success of DuckInTheForest game I decide to go forward and make a sequel: DUCK look for luck!

DUCK look for luck! it's 3D game where your goal is the same as in my first game. Get all coins and do not be catched by enemies!

I wanted to give you a possibility to see my isometric game in 3D world so I have build my first level of DuckInTheForest game in three dimension.

Enjoy my new game!
